SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX (SUBSTRING_INDEX(Club.club_hashtag,',',numbers.n),',',-1) club_hashtag
FROM (select 1 n union all select 2 union all select 3 union all select 4 union all select 5 union all select 6 union all select 7 union all select 8 union all select 9 union all select 10) numbers INNER JOIN club on CHAR_LENGTH ( Club.club_hashtag ) - CHAR_LENGTH ( REPLACE ( Club.club_hashtag , ',' , '' ))>= numbers . n-1 WHERE SUBSTRING_INDEX ( SUBSTRING_INDEX ( Club.club_hashtag , ' ' , numbers . n ), ' ' , -1 ) != ' ' AND club_num=#{clubNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO club(club_name, club_leader,club_kind, club_category, club_main_pic, club_thumb_pic, club_onoff, club_max, club_freq, club_content1, club_content1_pic, club_content2, club_content2_pic, club_makedate, club_shutdate, club_startdate, club_enddate, club_fee, club_hashtag, club_curnum, club_heart, club_latitude, club_longitude) VALUES(#{clubName}, #{clubLeader}, #{clubKind}, #{clubCategory}, #{clubMain_pic}, #{clubThumb_pic}, #{clubOnOff}, #{clubMax}, #{clubFreq}, #{clubContent1}, #{clubContent1_pic}, #{clubContent2}, #{clubContent2_pic}, NOW(), #{clubShutDate}, #{clubStartDate}, #{clubEndDate}, #{clubFee}, #{clubHashtag}, #{clubCurnum}, 0, #{clubLatitude}, #{clubLongitude})
INSERT INTO apply(club_num, member_num, apply_date) VALUES (#{clubNum}, #{memberNum}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM apply WHERE club_num = #{clubNum} AND member_num = #{memberNum}

SELECT club.club_num as clubNum , apply.member_num as memberNum , club.club_name as clubName , club.club_startdate as clubStartDate , club.club_enddate as clubEndDate FROM club , apply WHERE club.club_num = apply.club_num AND apply.member_num = #{memberNum}
